lines.text: We have a chance to get away. Let's take it.
Then where does it end? Either you'll be killed or somebody else is going to die if you go back there.
Why do you have to take on everybody else's troubles?
Nora, I've been living on borrowed time. There could be a bullet waiting around the next bend for me. But until then, I've got to do what I fell is right.
There's a town called Opportunity about a hundred miles south. I'll wait for you there.
I want to tell you something, young man. Your heroics will be forgotten in a month, so don't be so full of yourself. A smart man, he saves his glory days for the latter part of his life.
Jim, did you ever kill anybody?
I've been with posses that shot at men. Some of 'em fell. I figure my bullets was in there somewhere.
